sentences.sContent: From the context of the text, I find the next pretext for selling the textile.
sentences.sContent_eng: From the context of the text, I find the next pretext for selling the textile.
sentences.sCn: 我从课文的前后关系中找到卖纺织品的下一个借口。

sentences.sContent: In fact, some of these textile innovations are appearing on the catwalk.
sentences.sContent_eng: In fact, some of these textile innovations are appearing on the catwalk.
sentences.sCn: 事实上，有些纺织品创新正在登上时装表演的舞台。

phrases.pCn: n. 织物完成加工，织物整理加工；织物尾工
纺织品设计；织物设计；织物图案设计

trans.tranOther: any type of woven cloth that is made in large quantities, used especially by people in the business of making clothes etc
